answers.answer: You don't mention if it grows back sometimes in those spots.  I know my husband and I get the same thing, especially in the fall through spring when we wear long pants and shirts.  The friction of the clothing seems to wear away the hair in those spots.  Just a thought!

question: i lost my hair partly on my legs and arms, shins mostly an calfs, but what's weird is, that it is in same places on both legs, identical! could you please try and explain what might this be. This happened almost 5 years ago. Is there any solution for this?
title: hair loss on legs and arms
